Text: Is there any chance of getting an HD version of this one?
Thanks anyway, they actually used an image of mine in the show and I was hoping to get an HD copy without bothering them for it.

Actually you are quite lucky, I still have a full size copy(I usually delete it by now) but I don't really care to upload the full episode, it's in 1080p.  If you tell me what part to cut and encode I can do that.
Thank you for your time, but I can't get the 480 video to play correctly in VLC/MPlayerx, Quicktime/iTunes, of Divx Player so I think I'll just buy the episode.
